projectsPreview.title: Dream Agency
projectsPreview.description: Dream Agency is a project developed using Vanilla (HTML, CSS, JavaScript), aiming to elegantly, functionally, and innovatively replicate the basic structure of a landing page. Its simple design is fully responsive, including support for mobile devices.

projectsPreview.title: Final Round
projectsPreview.description: This is a video game development project that uses mathematical formulas to simulate a simple graphics engine, recreating the dynamics of arcade-style fighting games. It also incorporates modern development mechanics and process optimization techniques.

projectsPreview.title: Project Sakura
projectsPreview.description: This project aims to build a user management program with login and registration functionality. It integrates with Firebase's API and uses oAuth and 2Auth protocols for secure user registration and authentication.

projectsPreview.title: Google Clone
projectsPreview.description: This is a React-based project that replicates the structure of a Google search page. It employs class standardization techniques like BEM and style preprocessors such as SASS to achieve an identical design.
